name: Gaviscon Cool Liquid 300Ml
usage: <Cooking_Instructions><Preparation_and_Usage>This product is sugar free and gluten free. You can take this product if you are pregnant or breast feeding.Dosage: To be taken orally, shake well before use. Adults and children over 12 years: Take 10-20ml (two to four 5ml spoonfuls) after meals and at bedtime. Children 6 to 12 years: Take 5-10ml (one to two 5ml spoonfuls) after meals and at bedtime. Children under 6 years: Not recommended.</Preparation_and_Usage></Cooking_Instructions>
ingredients: Each 10ml of Oral Suspension contains 500mg Sodium Alginate Ph Eur, 267ml Sodium Bicarbonate Ph Eur and 160mg Calcium Carbonate Ph Eur as the active ingredients
It also contains Carbomer, Methyl (E218) and Propyl (E216) Parahydroxybenzoates, Sodium Saccharin, Mint Flavourings and Water
PromotionDescription: Save £2.50 on an Ortis Fruits & Fibres cubes or syrup Found in the healthcare aisle
Messages: <Messages>      <Message TypeCode="BulkBuyLimit" TriggerQuantity="99" GroupId="NOT_MAPPED" Description="Sorry, there is a limit of 99 on this product">        <Stores all="true" />      </Message>    </Messages>
